stats: This item always comes with an inherent Icy Sword Hilt that cannot be salvaged or replaced.
Icy Dragon SwordCold Dmg: 15-22(Requires 9 Swordsmanship)Damage +15%(while Health is above 50%)

When dropped as loot from Ice Imps, it comes with the following weapon stats:
Cold damage: 15-22 (Requires 9 Swordsmanship)
Damage +15% (while Health is above 50%) (inherent; cannot be replaced with an Inscription).
Icy Dragon SwordCold Dmg: 15-22(Requires 9 Swordsmanship)Inscription: None"Yakkington had to win a tug of war battle with an Ice Imp forthis little treasure!" -Nicholas

When obtained from a Gift of the Traveler, it has these stats:
Cold damage: 15-22 (Requires 9 Swordsmanship)
An empty Inscription slot.
It cannot be dyed nor sold.
It is appended with a note:
"Yakkington had to win a tug of war battle with an Ice Imp for this little treasure!" -Nicholas
